about_the_game:
Step into the wild world of supermarket management!

Think running a supermarket is easy? Think again! In this quirky and chaotic simulator, you’ll face the challenges of day-to-day retail like never before. Manage every aspect of your store, from stocking shelves to handling customers, all while dealing with unexpected surprises that will keep you on your toes. Whether you’re playing solo or teaming up with friends in co-op mode, get ready for non-stop fun and hilarity!

Build the Store of Your Dreams (or Nightmares!)

Take charge of designing your supermarket from scratch. Choose the layout, stock it with an array of products, and decorate to give it your unique flair. Will your store be an efficient retail paradise or a cluttered mess of mayhem? It’s all up to you!

Master the Art of Multitasking

Your customers are impatient, the shelves are empty, the floor is covered in mysterious spills, and the freezer’s broken—what do you do first? Balancing priorities is key as you manage the chaos of the retail world. The more efficiently you run your store, the more profits (and laughs) you’ll earn!

Solo or Co-Op: Choose Your Way to Play

Take on the challenge solo and rise from a humble corner shop to a sprawling megastore. Or bring in reinforcements with online or local co-op multiplayer! Work together with up to 3 friends to keep the store running smoothly—or enjoy the absolute chaos of trying to coordinate tasks. Who knew teamwork could be this entertaining?

Surprises at Every Turn

Think you’ve got everything under control? Not so fast! From mischievous customers causing trouble to power outages, rodent invasions, and even the occasional streaker in Aisle 5, your supermarket is always full of surprises. It’s your job to handle whatever comes your way!

Charming, Colorful, and Hilarious

With its vibrant art style, lovable characters, and a healthy dose of slapstick humor, this simulator delivers an experience that’s as charming as it is challenging. Watch customers interact with your store in funny, unpredictable ways, and enjoy a retail adventure that never takes itself too seriously.

Features at a Glance:

  • Customizable Supermarkets: Design layouts, choose products, and decorate to make your store one of a kind.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Stock shelves, assist customers, and keep things running smoothly while juggling unexpected events.

  • Co-Op Mayhem: Join forces with friends in online or local multiplayer, where collaboration often leads to comedy.

  • Solo Campaign: Start small and build your retail empire, tackling increasingly difficult challenges along the way.

  • Hilarious Events: Face off against unique challenges like spills, cart collisions, and demanding VIP customers.

  • Replayability: Experiment with strategies and layouts to achieve the perfect store—or just embrace the chaos for fun!

Whether you want to test your management skills or just share some laughs with friends, this supermarket simulator is packed with endless fun, wacky surprises, and plenty of charm. Ready to take the retail world by storm? Let the madness begin!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Run your own supermarket in this chaotic co-op/singleplayer simulator! Stock shelves, manage customers, and overcome quirky challenges in a lively, customizable store. Work solo or team up with friends for hilarious, fast-paced fun.
